attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app made me very sick and i started going on a rampage 😡😡😡🙄👍 i was very angry with this app that it made me kill my entire family and then myself 🤬🤬 i wish i could give 0 stars 😟 but one will do 😡

attributes.title: Fake reviews trying to delete app 🇺🇸
attributes.review: God bless America and god bless trump for 2020! Great app 🇺🇸

attributes.title: 🌝❤️NO🧚🏼💞😡
attributes.review: So I got this app to see what all of my friends were talking abt and um I hate this so much and everything was glitching so much and it was supper slow. Over all this app is the worst😡

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Besides the fact the Donald trump is In, I don’t like it. You have to sign in just to see some Donald trump news? Yeah I’m not giving this idiotic president my personal info. He disgusts me and so does this app. 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: The app made me feel uncomfortable and showed me that he is being dishonest to his word and it truly disgusts me. I feel like he is just shaming us for our gender, skin tone, race and sexuality

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app is horrible I downloaded it for no reason, y?, because trump is a horrible person and does not deserve to have an app or be the president so thank you have a great day.

attributes.title: 100% don’t recommend
attributes.review: The quality of the app was horrible it didn’t fit what I was envisioning the App Store should really take this app down 👎🏾.

attributes.title: Disappointed.
attributes.review: I was expecting great things from this app.. you would think with such a great president he’s app would be great to.. or at least usable.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I was going to get this app to teach my son about fruits specifically oranges , because obviously the mascot for this app is in orange cosplay . My son is five years old and now has been taught how to be a bad president

attributes.title: terrible 👋🏼❌
attributes.review: this is quite possibly the worst app i have ever seen. ever. every time i log in it crashes and every time i even try to open it, it sends my phone into some sort of robot shock mode to the point where my phone crashes, steam comes out of the speakers, and the screen is purple and blue. i don’t know what is on this app but it’s awful. ❌❌❌😹😹😹👋🏼👋🏼👋🏼
